EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
On behalf of Monash University, I am pleased to offer you a Postgraduate Publications Award. The award is designed to support graduate research students, whilst under examination, to disseminate their research findings to a wider public through publishing in professional journals or books.
To be eligible for the award you must:
Fulfil the thesis submission requirements, by ensuring your thesis is submitted for examination between 1 July – 30 September, 2016. Adhere to the conditions of award, outlined in the PPA Guidelines as per the website
Acceptance
To accept this award, please email mge-thesisexams@monash.edu within seven working days from the date of this email.
Initiate payment
To arrange payment of your Postgraduate Publication Award, you must provide the following:
1. Confirmation email online thesis submission initiated (Note: Thesis submission date = Date online thesis submission approved)
2. Complete the Scholarships Banking Details form; and
3. Tax File Number Declaration form
Once these criterion have been met, we will arrange payment of the award.
The PPA is a taxable stipend of $6,630.00 which will be paid fortnightly over a maximum of 12 weeks period to assist you while preparing articles or a book for publication. The actual stipend will be paid on a pro-rata basis. No other benefits are payable. Please refer to PPA guidelines for full details.
If you have concerns regarding access to Monash University facilities, you should discuss Monash affiliate access with your supervisor and academic unit.
Upon completion of your PPA, you will be required to complete a Final report, which will assist with planning and promoting these types of awards for students in the future. The final report can be accessed here.
On behalf of Monash Graduate Education, I congratulate you on being offered this award and wish you every success in the future. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact the team via: mge-thesisexams@monash.edu.
Yours sincerely,
The Examinations team Graduate Research Examinations Team ​ | Graduate Research Services _______________________
